summary: This bill, the Accelerate Long-term Investment Growth Now Act (ALIGN Act), proposes amendments to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It aims to permanently allow a tax deduction at the time an investment in qualified property is made, specifically by setting the applicable percentage for expensing at 100%. The bill makes conforming amendments to various sections of the code related to this provision, including modifications to recovery periods and effective dates tied to previous legislation.
